--- Pacifix / Cossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix stands, having fully regained counsciousness. He feels the 
ship tilting and his mask drops a bit, "Oh no..." He starts running 
towards the control room. He tests his commlink, opening a 
broadcasting for all Autobots, "Autobots, this is Commander 
Pacifix, reports status immediately." He keeps running.

Crossroads walks out of the room he was in to see the Dinobots. 
He begins to slide into Grimlock, but stops himself before what 
might have been unpleasant. "Whoa, what's going on here..." He 
says to everyone and no one at the same time. Walking, with 
difficulty, over to a side seat, he sits down, and grabs a bar and 
holds on. Hearing Pacifix he does just that, reports. "Crossroads 
here, looking about 100%, but I'd sure like to know what just 
happened there..." He closes his commlink, slightly bewildered.

Pacifix arrives at control room, and discovers that the ship is in 
working condition, but only minor thrusters are operational. For 
some reason, the larger rear burst thrusters had been destroyed 
beyond repair during the... unknown anomaly. Checking the 
scanners, he finds that the ship is falling quickly towards a small 
island, surrounded by littles islands, and two continents, one larger 
than the other.

Pacifix immediately fires the remaining thrusters, and starts to try 
to slow the ship down. He opens a commlink to JetV, "JetV, get to 
the control room now." He keeps putting maximum power into 
slowing the ship down, and leveling it out for the enevitable crash 
landing on the island straight ahead.
